name: lightWeightArray.vim
summary: *obsolete* Small utility to work with vim multivalues variables
description:
I have improved this script and uploaded as a new script called multvals.vim. Please download it from here:

http://vim.sourceforge.net/scripts/script.php?script_id=171

This defines two readonly functions to work with ',' separated multivalues such as "tags". You can also use it as a light-weight array operations. You can make up an array by concatenating a set of values with a ',' in between them and later use these functions to extract the individual values.
install_details: Source it or drop it in your plugin directory.
